ProjectTitle: Optical binding of nanoparticles outside the photon beam: the creation of primeval optical matter
InitialFeedbackHistory: 15/01/2024 [REDACTED] please note that using hard drives for data storage gives a high risk of data loss; and that the costs that you mention are much higher than expected for the data volume described in the table. [REDACTED] a look at the storage guide for more information and recommended storage solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] please note that the KU [REDACTED] policy asks for preservation of all relevant data for 10 years, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy [REDACTED] [REDACTED] is not a suitable repository for data sharing, you can use RDR to make your data available for reuse: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
